texture_geometry_comments: Head length fraction: we want it 0.2 * headTextureH/16, and then alpha_reduction=0.76
From this come torso and leg length fractions, as each simply half of the remainder of a 16x16 head
Torso W/H ratio: we want it textureW/textureH, and then alpha_reduction=0.79
Here we address most common dimensions: head=16x17, torso=22x32
